document.full_text: medical progress and global efforts to reduce infant and child mortality have reversed historical trends and mean that death rates among adolescents are now higher than in children, researchers said on tuesday.
document.title: adolescent death rates outpace child mortality
lines_and_colors: medical progress and global efforts to reduce infant and child mortality have reversed historical trends and mean that death rates among adolescents are now higher than in children, researchers said on tuesday.
